body.raw:
Hi Yvaine,

Please create an expense claim for the below. Relevant details are marked up as
requested…

<expense><cost_centre>DEV002</cost_centre>
    <total>1024.01</total><payment_method>personal card</payment_method>
</expense>

From: Ivan Castle
Sent: Friday, 16 February 2018 10:32 AM
To: Antoine Lloyd <Antoine.Lloyd@example.com>
Subject: test

Hi Antoine,

Please create a reservation at the <vendor>Viaduct Steakhouse</vendor> our <description>development team’s project end celebration dinner</description> on <date>Tuesday 25 April 2017</date>. We expect to arrive around 7.15pm. Approximately 12 people but I’ll confirm exact numbers closer to the day.

Regards,
Ivan
